author: remm
msg: - Document the newest features of the HTTP connector.

author: remm
msg: - In this case, we're in embedded mode, and dynamically creating a host
(and it works !! thx Costin :) ), so using auto deployment is not a good idea
(context restarts need to be controlled by the embedding software).

author: remm
msg: - Use reload with a standard context (it might do stuff once again someday).
- Init deployer on startup to avoid possible CL issues when embedded.
